it.polimi.se2019.model.player

Class PlayerBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.se2019.model.player.PlayerBoard

  • public class PlayerBoard
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the player board and all the players information.
    Author:
    Desno365

      • swapWeapon

                             int indexOfTheWeaponCardToDrop)
        Remove and returns the weaponCardToDrop from the inventory while adding weaponToGrab.

        Returns:
        the weapon card to drop.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the weapon to remove is not present in the player's inventory.
